title: Electronic Health Record-Based Medication-Related Problem Detection Simulation Training

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental principles of pharmacotherapy and understanding of electronic health record (EHR) system interfaces
context.additional_context: Simulation-based learning environments designed for current practitioners to enhance workplace applicability.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately identify at least three types of medication-related problems (MRPs) in a simulated EHR environment.
Learners can derive and interpret at least two key clinical clues in information-overloaded situations during patient case analysis.
Learners can apply an evidence-based decision-making framework to evaluate ambiguous EHR information (e.g., conflicting test results) and define MRPs with 80% accuracy.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
